resources.string: Founded in 1992 (30 years already), by its president, Dr Th√©ophane AYI, UATM till date has over 2000 students who are enrolled in the 23 accredited courses of the university. This makes it the first private university in Benin. Thus, the pedagogical/instructive team of the UATM strives to train/educate the best engineers, entrepreneurs, accountants, agronomists and lawyers, as demonstrated by our results in national and international examinations/competitions. Furthermore, the excellent integrative rate of our graduates into professional life is also a source of pride to us. Many recognize this fact and distinguish the UATM for its performance
